alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 24 at 2:16AM MST until December 25 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Ground blizzard conditions expected. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, while drifting snow could lead to complete lane blockages.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
